title: Revenge (A Tony Scott Film)
description:
==========================================================================================================================================================================


Michael "Jay" Cochran has just left the Navy after 12 years. He's not quite sure what he's going to do, except that he knows he wants a holiday. He decides to visit Tiburon Mendez, a powerful but shady Mexican businessman who he once flew to Alaska for a hunting trip. Arriving at the Mendez mansion in Mexico, he is immediately surprised by the beauty and youth of Mendez' wife Miryea.

Their attraction to each other is undeniable, but Cochran is aware that Mendez is a powerful, vindictive, and very possessive man who does not tolerate betrayal.


==========================================================================================================================================================================


Directed By: Tony Scott

MPAA: Rated " R " For Graphic Violence And Language.

Runtime: 2 Hours, 3 Minutes, 35 Seconds

Genre: Action / Thriller / Drama

Plot Keywords: Mexico / Beating / Revenge / Shotgun

Country: USA

Tagline: A Passion That Cannot Be Denied. A Betrayal That Cannot Be Forgiven.

Language: English

DVD Audio Language: English, French, Spanish

Subtitles: English, French, Spanish

Color: Color

Format: Anamorphic Widescreen ( Aspect Ratio: 2.35:1 )

Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 2.0

Release Date: 16 February 1990 (USA)

DVD System Source: NTSC Version (Region 1)

DVD Compression Quality: Completely Untouched & Uncompressed.

Original Motion Picture Soundtrack Included ( Ripped By Booster2 ).
